definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn

sentences.english: Jack and the other men were hanged.
sentences.chinese: 傑克和其他男海盜都被處絞刑。

sentences.english: In 1927 he died on the gallows of the warlords.
sentences.chinese: 1927年他犧牲在軍閥的絞刑架上。

sentences.english: The murderer entreated the judge for mercy, but was sentenced to the gallows .
sentences.chinese: 兇手乞求法官寬恕，但還是被判了絞刑。

sentences.english: To reform a man is a tedious and uncertain labour; hanging the sure work of a minute.
sentences.chinese: 改造人是冗長而無把握的工作，絞刑則是舉手之勞。

sentences.english: At the same time, the rarity of execution means it is no deterrent.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，絞刑的極少執行意也味着它不具有威懾性。

sentences.english: Hanging is an atrociously archaic way of killing a human being.
sentences.chinese: 絞刑是一種殘忍的殺人方法。

sentences.english: He was hanged for his crimes.
Can Minha find evidence to save her father from the gallows?
sentences.chinese: 我的發現任何證據可以挽救她的父親從絞刑架？

sentences.english: Many died of hunger and disease.
sentences.chinese: 許多人被處絞刑或死於疾病。

sentences.english: Unless there is a reprieve the condemned man will hang on Friday .
sentences.chinese: 除非緩刑，那個被宣判的人將於星期五被處絞刑。

sentences.english: Now i was to expiate all my offences at the gallows .
sentences.chinese: 現在我將在絞刑架上贖我一切的罪過。

sentences.english: Yesterday the five murderers were hanged together.
sentences.chinese: 昨天那5個殺人犯一同處了絞刑。

sentences.english: Blackwood is executed by hanging, and declared dead by Dr. Watson himself.
sentences.chinese: 布萊克伍德被執行絞刑，並由華生醫生親自宣告死亡。

sentences.english: At last he was hunted down and killed by hanging.
sentences.chinese: 最後，他還是遭到追捕，被處以絞刑。

sentences.english: We must all hang together, or we shall all hang separately.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須團結在一起，否則我們將分別被處絞刑。

sentences.english: Thus my excuse for the gallows humor that pervades this story.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我國藉口絞刑架幽默貫穿這個故事。

definition: variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
variant of 誣衊|诬蔑[wu1 mie4]
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
unjust charge or verdict/miscarriage of justice/frame-up
to make a report after the event/to make a supplementary report/to repay a kindness
